titleStmt.title: An account of the manner of the behaviour of the prisoners who received sentence of death, on Saturday the first of September, 1688 at the Sessions-House in the Old-Bailey. Of which Charles O Bryan and Daniel Carey were executed at Tybun on Friday the 7th of September, 1688. With a relation of their several facts for which they were condemned, and what happened at the place of execution.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by D. Mallet, next door to the sign of the Star between Fleet Bridge and Bridewell-bridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

person.persName: D. Mallet, next door to the sign of the Star between Fleet Bridge
